attributes.action: SAVE BURTON ON TRENT TA CENTRE
attributes.additional_details: The Reserve forces in Burton on trent are moving out, but the Army and Air Cadets still need a place to train.  Keep the TA centre open for the Cadets and create a combined services club for all ex uniformed servicemen and women (including the Armed Forces, Police, Fire and medical services, this also includes their families.  The centre could also be used for Armed forces charities, like combat stress.  It could also be  used by the local community for training, events and for meetings.
